```{r, echo=TRUE}

skim(movies)
```
We notice that its a clean data set with no NA values. 

```{r, echo=TRUE}

movies_filtered<- movies %>%
  filter(year>=2000) 

 plot1<- ggplot(movies_filtered, aes(x=budget, y=gross, colour=genre)) + geom_point()+
   labs(title="How does gross profit change with budget?")
 
 plot1
```

We see that most of the movies have a linear relationship in terms of budget and
